name: CQ.Ext.tree.TreeLoader
doc:
A TreeLoader provides for lazy loading of an CQ.Ext.tree.TreeNode's child
nodes from a specified ...

configs.doc: (optional) An object containing properties which specify HTTP parameters to be passed to each req...

configs.name: clearOnLoad
configs.doc: (optional) Default to true. Remove previously existing child nodes before loading.

configs.name: dataUrl
configs.doc: The URL from which to request a Json string which specifies an array of node definition objects r...

configs.name: directFn
configs.doc: Function to call when executing a request.

configs.name: nodeParameter
configs.doc: The name of the parameter sent to the server which contains the identifier of the node. Defaults ...

configs.name: paramOrder
configs.doc: Defaults to undefined. Only used when using directFn. Specifies the params in the order in which ...

configs.name: paramsAsHash
configs.doc: Only used when using directFn. Send parameters as a collection of named arguments (defaults to fa...

configs.name: preloadChildren
configs.doc: If set to true, the loader recursively loads "children" attributes when doing the first load on n...

configs.name: requestMethod
configs.doc: The HTTP request method for loading data (defaults to the value of CQ.Ext.Ajax.method).

configs.name: uiProviders
configs.doc: (optional) An object containing properties which specify custom CQ.Ext.tree.TreeNodeUI implementa...

methods.name: createNode
methods.doc:
Override this function for custom TreeNode node implementation, or to
modify the attributes at cr...

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: load
methods.doc:
Load an CQ.Ext.tree.TreeNode from the URL specified in the constructor.
This is called automatica...

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

events.name: beforeload
events.doc: Fires before a network request is made to retrieve the Json text which specifies a node's children.

events.name: load
events.doc: Fires when the node has been successfuly loaded.

events.name: loadexception
events.doc: Fires if the network request failed.
